home.dashboardTitle: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme
home.apOverviewTitle: Mahatma Gandhi NREGA – Andhra Pradesh Overview
home.individualsWorkedDesc: Total individuals who received work opportunities
home.aboutMinistryDesc: Under the Ministry of Rural Development, the programme focuses on delivering 100 days of guaranteed wage employment for registered households while supporting durable community assets.
home.programOverviewDesc: What's happening in your area this year
home.convergenceDesc: Partnerships with other central and state schemes ensure that works undertaken under MGNREGA are coordinated with agriculture, water conservation, and climate resilience goals.
home.convergence1Desc: Joint planning with irrigation departments to recharge groundwater and strengthen canals.
home.convergence2Desc: Linking self-help groups with wage seekers for enterprise development and skilling.
home.convergence3Desc: Afforestation and nursery raising activities in convergence with state forest programmes.
home.internationalCoopDesc: Knowledge exchanges with global partners help share best practices on large-scale employment programmes and digital governance innovations.
home.globalNetworkDesc: Collaboration with multilateral agencies to study the impact of wage employment schemes on rural livelihoods and climate adaptation.
home.bestPracticeDesc: Delegations from South Asia and Africa participate in periodic workshops to observe implementation at the grassroots level.
home.mobileAppsDesc: Track job cards, attendance, and payments through official mobile applications designed for beneficiaries and field officers.
home.officialLoginDesc: Registered programme officers can access the MIS dashboard, approve works, and monitor payments using their secure login credentials.
home.whatsNew2Title: Updated wage rates notified for FY 2025-26
home.whatsNew4Title: Training calendar for mates and field engineers published
home.programExplanation1: This program helps people in villages get paid work. If you need a job and want to earn money, you can work on community projects.
home.programExplanation2: You will get paid every day for the work you do. Your district leader will tell you about work opportunities near your village.
home.footerDesc: A government program to provide work and income to rural families
home.noData: No information available for this year
